name: Oproto
description:
Go forth my minion and explore what looks dangerous, because for you, no death awaits. Only life eternal or a life fulfilled.

Buttons:

Arrows: Move
WASD: Move (alternative)
Space: Shield stomp
J: mute sound effects
K: mute music

Artist's (Bluzi) Games: https://bluzi.itch.io/
Programmer's (Ivanbje) Games: https://ivanbje.itch.io/
